tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ***** **** ** ****** *** **** ** *** **** **** ** ***** ** ***** ************ His unwavering dedication to his young patients and their families is unparalleled. With Dr. Goel, you're not just getting a doctor; you're getting a trusted partner in your child's health journey* *** ***** ** ********** combined with his gentle demeanor, puts both children and parents at ease from the moment you step into his office. Dr. Goel's ability to listen attentively, diagnose accurately, and provide comprehensive care sets him apart as a true expert in his field. I have complete confidence in Dr. Rajesh Kumar Goel, and I wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone seeking top-tier care for their child.
Very much satisfied with his treatment and also his friendly behavior. Thank you so much doctor. We are happy with your treatment.

Don't ever go to this doctor. **** ****** ******* **** **** *************** *** **** behaves rudely. My baby had cold and nasal block ***  ******* ** ***** **** Doctor made the mother of the baby remove his wrapper ******** ** *** ********* **** ***** When the baby cried on removal of the wrapper he said it is because the baby is hungry. Had the mother force feed the baby and when the baby was not drinking milk properly as he was clearly not that hungry the doctor started saying that you people don't know how to manage a baby. On second visit we confirmed his timing at the hospital on a call with him. He himself said that he would meet at Columbia at the specified time but when we visited the hospital, he blatantly disagreed to see the baby and even shouted on the desk staff for calling him.  ***** *** ********* *** ********* **** **** *** **** *** ***** * ******** **** ** *** **** ** *** ******** *********** Finally, we had to meet an ER doctor and then we changed the doctor ***** *** * ****** ***** ** *** **** ** ******* *****
This all happened when this Doctor himself specified the timing for meeting at the hospital and and ignored the urgency of the baby's health *** *** **** **** ** *** ******* *** **** ******* *** ********* ******* *** ** *** ******** ****** ***** ****** Overall a very bad experience and never visit this Doctor for your baby.
He is very gentle by nature & I am satisfied his way to treat my 4 years daughter's health issues. Plz I highly suggested that if anyone can go through his medical care.

Dr goel was very attentive to my 3 year childs health issues. She was suffering with complicated health problems and he has addressed them all. He is very kind and patient. I am very grateful for him.
